name: Windows Virtual Tour (Abandoned Satirical Horror Game)
name_original: Windows Virtual Tour (Abandoned Satirical Horror Game)
description:
(Windows Virtual Tour is in no way affiliated with Microsoft. Windows 10 and all Microsoft products belong to Microsoft. This game is merely satire!)

(Originally Created in 2015)

Explore Microsoft head offices in this cutting-edge, virtual environment experience! Narrated, directed, guided, designed, contrived, and schemed up by Microsoft Sam (Recasted Voice Actor).

But remember, not everything is as it seems...

This game was one of my first ever Unity games back in 2015. It's clearly unfinished and has no main menu, no loading screen, not even a watermark saying it is my game. However, I thought what it is, has some sense of humor in it, and wanted to share it with people. I do not own any of Microsoft's IP, nor do I own the songs Pink Fluffy Unicorn Dancing on Rainbows, or Darude Sandstorm. If there is an issue with the usage of anyone's IP in this game, I will take it down without hesitation. Again, this is a fan game purely made for satire and learning experiences. (I was 13 at the time of making it).

Check out my previous games, and trailers on my website, GameJolt, social media, or Youtube!
